localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The best products are built by those equipped with the best knowledge. Build your information base and explore your intellectual curiousity through a crowdsourced compilation of 650+ CS courses from top universities.
nodes.title: College Compendium - A collection of 650+ university CS courses for the curious
nodes.author: Samuel Crombie

nodes.excerpt: Learney saves you time by planning the optimal path for you through community-built knowledge graphs, given your knowledge and interests.
nodes.title: Learney - Personalised learning for tech with knowledge graphs
nodes.author: Henry Pulver

nodes.excerpt: Join a supportive community for self-taught and bootcamp developers. We do voice call AMAs with experienced developers were you can ask them anything you like about learning to code, getting hired or how to be a better developer.
nodes.title: No CS Degree Community - Join a community for self-taught and bootcamp developers
nodes.author: Pete

nodes.excerpt: Learn by building real apps using Swift, React, Flutter and more. Completely redesigned and 100% made with SwiftUI. New features include downloads, picture-in-picture, favorites, history and widgets.
nodes.title: Design+Code iOS 2.0 - Learn SwiftUI, React & UI design, completely redesigned
nodes.author: Meng To

nodes.excerpt: Learn a new language with Chatterbug Streams, the first app for learning Spanish, French and German through interactive live streams. Watch Peloton-like live streams tailored to your level with real-time quizzes and polls.
nodes.title: Chatterbug Streams - Learn a new language with live streamed classes
nodes.author: Scott Chacon

nodes.excerpt: Carden is a Chrome Extension that helps you turn the content you consume into long-term knowledge. Create flashcards in context, view in-depth stats, collect points and level up, and much more.
nodes.title: Carden - Science-based flashcard app with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Alyssa X

nodes.excerpt: Learn Product Management from 250+ Curated Twitter threads
nodes.title: Uni of Threads - Learn product management from 250+ curated Twitter threads
nodes.author: Yang

nodes.excerpt: UI Chunks is a complete source of UI design knowledge, organized in easy-to-learn chunks which refers to the structure of design systems. https://gumroad.com/a/43717747/EiVkk (74 pages guide, Figma/Sketch Library). Get this ultimate buttons guide for a coffee price.
nodes.title: UI Chunks E01 - Buttons - Design system in easy-to-learn chunks & component libraries

nodes.excerpt: Poised is a personalized digital communication coach that provides actionable, real-time feedback during online meetings. Poised works with Zoom, Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet, among other platforms.
nodes.title: Poised - AI-powered communication coach for online meetings
nodes.author: Charles Hua

nodes.excerpt: The purpose behind this list of 150 SEO terms and articles is to help you deepen your SEO knowledge. SEO is developing rapidly and we tried to make a resource to learn more about key concepts. The glossary is regularly updated so it is always ready to serve :)
nodes.title: SEO Glossary by Serpstat - An extensive list of 150+ SEO terms and helpful resources

nodes.excerpt: Learn from Google's +100 failures to build profitable businesses and scale acquired companies.
nodes.title: Google Cemetery - Learn from Google's 100+ biggest failures

nodes.excerpt: Hack The Interview is the only interview training system that guarantees a user a job offer within 90 days or their money back! HTI relies on a community of curated mentors to provide invaluable training to job seekers throughout their interview process.
nodes.title: Hack The Interview - Job Offer in 90 days, Guaranteed.
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: A practical guide with resources to build the product management foundational knowledge, ways to develop PM skills and tips to set yourself up for a career in product management.
nodes.title: Zero To PM - A handy eBook for aspiring product managers.
nodes.author: AD

nodes.excerpt: Teach live, one-on-one, or with a group, using the most versatile collaborative space for online lessons.
nodes.title: Lessonspace - The easiest way to teach online

nodes.excerpt: Open Syllabus is a non-profit research organization that collects and analyzes millions of syllabi to support novel teaching and learning applications.
nodes.title: Open Syllabus - Mapping the college curriculum across 7M+ syllabi
nodes.author: Espen Kulia

nodes.excerpt: leerly teaches Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input. Popular articles from the web are summarized and translated to beginner Spanish, which users then enjoy using a suite of built-in tools to make the reading experience fun and effective.
nodes.title: leerly - Learn Spanish with compelling, comprehensible input
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: LEADx does for leadership coaching what Duolingo did for learning a new language. Bite-sized content that can fit into a few minutes of free time. Nudges and reminders about topics you recently learned. Guided coaching on topics that matter to you right now.
nodes.title: LEADx - Coaching for next-gen leaders
nodes.author: Lucas Carlson

nodes.excerpt: Weekly live video podcast + newsletter + Discord + Learn new community tools and trends from makers + Hang out with community builders, developer advocates, streamers, and creators who embrace the passion economy https://devrelevents.substack.com/ph66
nodes.title: The Communities Show - Come for the podcast & stay for the community
nodes.author: Rick Turoczy

nodes.excerpt: What's daunting about self-learning is not unknown, but not knowing what's unknown. It's like fumbling in a dark room with a lighter not knowing how big it is. WarmMachine maps domain concepts in machine learning and lights the room up for self-learners.
nodes.title: WarmMachine - Your personal knowledge manager
nodes.author: Quinn Dai
